title: [U]: Apple sold out of last iPods ever, here’s where you can still buy an iPod touch
content:
After Apple announced it is discontinuing the iPod touch (7th generation) yesterday and retiring the iPod altogether, consumers have been rushing to retailers in-store and online to buy one of these devices. The product is only being sold at retailers while supplies last. 

more…

The post [U]: Apple sold out of last iPods ever, here’s where you can still buy an iPod touch appeared first on 9to5Mac.
description: While we don’t have exact inventory counts, here’s where you can buy an iPod touch. We’ll update periodically as inventory changes.
